1.Title: String & Melody
1.Description: CRIT DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>50%</color>. When the equipper enters combat, or activates a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, they gain 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Heartstring</color>. Each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Heartstring</color> allows the equipper's <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> to ignore <color=#2BAD00>12.5%</color> of the target's <color=#FF5521>Fire RES</color>, stacking up to 2 times and lasting 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
